name: docdown
description: A simple JSDoc to Markdown documentation generator.
author: John-David Dalton <john.david.dalton@gmail.com> (http://allyoucanleet.com/)

scripts.doc: node bin/docdown index.js doc/README.md style=github title="docdown <sup>v${npm_package_version}</sup>" url=https://github.com/jdalton/docdown/blob/${npm_package_version}/index.js
